name: HematocritCapillaryInVolumeFraction
title: Hematocrit Capillary in Volume Fraction
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab tests commonly used to measure hematocrit done on a source of capillary blood.  The measurement is represented as volume fraction-%.  These codes are LOINC codes.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of capillary blood to measure hematocrit.  Using the Quality Data Model, this data element maps to the Laboratory, Result or Laboratory, Order data type.),(Inclusion Criteria: Hematocrit lab test using the source of capillary test with a reporting scale of volume fraction-%.),(Exclusion Criteria: Hematocrit lab test using a non-capillary source of blood.)

concept.display: Hematocrit [Pure volume fraction] of Capillary blood

contains.display: Hematocrit [Pure volume fraction] of Capillary blood
